title.rendered: INTECH wins “Resilient Champion” Award at ABB’s Channel Partner Conference in Spain

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

INTECH’s was recognized at the conference which brought together 200 channel partners from across 34 countries worldwide.

ABB recognized INTECH’s “outstanding customer commitment, performing at the highest level in the most difficult environments” with the “Resilient Champion Award” at its biggest channel partner conference of the year in Tarragona, Spain.

Representing INTECH at the conference, Umair Bukhari, VP GCC sales, and Ahmed Raza, Director of Iraq & CIS sales received the award before an audience of around 200 channel partners from across 34 countries worldwide at the Partner Conference.

Through this award, ABB also recognized INTECH’s “collaboration and commitment that continues to drive our partnership to new levels. We present you with this award to honor your great work, successes, and contribution to our partnership”.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]The theme of ABB’s channel partner conference ‘Unleashing the power of partnerships’ was covered during panel discussions, workshops, portfolio updates, breakout sessions and product demonstrations at the conference. Channel partners were engaged with discussions surrounding growth opportunities, digital solutions and lifecycle service opportunities which gave them greater insight into opportunities to collaborate with ABB and customers. In addition to this, focused sessions on specific industries and solutions provided channel partners with in-depth understanding on ABB solutions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]About ABB’s Process Automation

ABB’s Process Automation business automates, electrifies and digitalizes industrial operations that address a wide range of essential needs – from supplying energy, water and materials, to producing goods and transporting them to market. With its ~20,000 employees, leading technology and service expertise, ABB Process Automation helps customers in process, hybrid and maritime industries improve performance and safety of operations, enabling a more sustainable and resource-efficient future.

For more information: https://new.abb.com/about/our-businesses/process-automation

About ABB
ABB is a technology leader in electrification and automation, enabling a more sustainable and resource-efficient future. The company’s solutions connect engineering know-how and software to optimize how things are manufactured, moved, powered and operated. Building on more than 130 years of excellence, ABB’s ~105,000 employees are committed to driving innovations that accelerate industrial transformation.

For more information: https://global.abb/group/en

About INTECH

INTECH Automation & Intelligence is a globally renowned industrial automation & digitalization technology company. For nearly 30 years we have helped major oil & gas companies resolve their most pressing issues of instrumentation, control, and electrical automation. INTECH’s diversiﬁed automation solution portfolio, technical skills, knowledge, and expertise on equipment from all major OEMs, and our asset-application speciﬁc approach to solution design are what differentiates us from a typical system integrator.

As part of our promise of helping businesses evolve in the Industry 4.0 era, we have focused on building up our expertise on Industrial IoT and related digitalization solutions. We are gradually shifting from a project-based solution provider to a partnership-based solution provider. We have started working closely with our technology and platform partners as well as clients to build long-term relationships where we work together to solve problems and provide solutions that are cost-efficient, time-efficient, and bring the best of what everyone can offer.

For more information, please visit: www.intechww.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
